_source.short_desc: Apply empowers organizations to seamlessly collect, manage and review grant applications and drive better, faster funding decisions.
_source.long_desc: Move towards your mission, faster. Create a frictionless grantmaking process with SurveyMonkey Apply (formerly known as FluidReview). Seamlessly collect and review applications online, save time with robust automations, gain insights with powerful reports, and more. Special non-profit pricing is available.
_source.target_audience: Grant-making organizations of all shapes and sizes, including foundations, academic institutions, government agencies and corporations.

related_products.short_desc: A visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective for your team on any project in a fun, flexible, and rewarding way.
related_products.features: From sales and marketing to HR and operations, teams can design and customize Trello to fit their unique needs and work styles. And with over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub of cross-team collaboration no matter where your work needs to happen. Trello brings joy to teamwork by making it transparent and easily shareable across boards and teams.

related_products.short_desc: Jira is a fully-featured workflow management tool for teams planning and building great products.
related_products.features: Jira is the workflow management tool for teams planning and building great products. Thousands of teams choose Jira to capture and organize issues, assign work, and follow team activity. At your desk or on the go with the new mobile interface, Jira helps your team get the job done.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9,000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
related_products.features: Asana is a workflow management tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: monday.com Work OS is the fully customizable, collaborative, no-code work management platform built to optimize all types of workflows.
related_products.features: Build your ideal workflow and achieve more, with the help of monday.com Work OS. Automate all mundane, repetitive tasks such as reminders and status updates, so you and your team can focus on essential work. Assign clear ownership in projects, collaborate effectively in real-time, and easily coordinate work across your team so everyone is aligned and up-to-date on priorities. monday.com Work OS is the fully customizable, no-code work management platform built to optimize all types of workflows.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, enables project management & task collaboration that is redefining how teams work. Its easy-to-use interface, coupled with file sharing, Gantt charts, Kanban view, and work automation features have helped it quickly grow into a favorite business app for productivity. 

*2015 Google Marketplace App of the Year 
*2015 Microsoft O365 App of the Year 
*Gartner Cool Vendor 2015 - Project & Portfolio Management

related_products.short_desc: Microsoft Visio is a diagramming solution that helps visualize data-connected business process flows, empower remote teamwork, and more
related_products.features: Microsoft Visio is a diagramming solution with a robust library of templates and shapes, data connectivity capabilities, and integrated collaboration tools to empower remote workers and teams anywhere. Create impactful visualizations using provided shapes and starter files.  Edit diagrams stored online simultaneously with colleagues through a web browser to work with others anywhere securely and effortlessly. Even connect diagrams to real-time data to make decisions quickly.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a workflow management software with custom workflows, shared dashboards, Gantt charts, Kanban boards, and automated approvals.
related_products.features: Wrike is a work management software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Streamline your document management with cloud-based, in-context file storage. Share documents within custom request forms and tasks, shorten your approval cycles with visual proofing, and quickly tag teammates for any file requests. Accelerate your delivery with Wrike's 400+ integrations, including other document management software. Documents are easy-to-find and task discussions and updates can be seen in seconds.

related_products.short_desc: Our online diagramming application makes it easy to create and share workflow diagramss.
related_products.features:
Visualize and improve your business processes using Lucidchart's workflow software. Create easy-to-follow workflow diagrams in minutes with our template library.

From system design to brainstorming to project management, we support all of your communication and collaboration needs. That's why millions of users choose Lucidchart.

related_products.short_desc: Airtable combines an intuitive spreadsheet interface with file attachments, kanban boards, calendars, and other powerful features.
related_products.features: Airtable is the all-in-one collaboration platform that combines the flexibility of a spreadsheet interface with rich features like file attachments, kanban card stacks, calendars, and reporting.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

similar_products.short_desc: Qntrl's powerful, no-code workflow orchestrations bring visibility, control, and automation to all your business processes.
similar_products.features: Created for people who orchestrate processes for their team, department, or organization, Qntrl is the easiest way to bring visibility, control, and automation to your work processes. Using powerful, no-code orchestrations, Qntrl lets you streamline your workflows in a matter of minutes. Our ever-growing community of orchestrators is already 1,000+ strong, with customers like County Broadband, Apollo Hospitals, Digital Forensics Corp, and ITC Limited using Qntrl to streamline their workflows.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho Creator is a workflow management software that helps you automate and digitze all aspects of your business.
similar_products.features:
A workflow automation software to create custom workflows, streamline communication, and automate routine tasks efficiently to manage your business.

Build complex workflows with Creator's drag-and-drop interface. The rich suite of features, like integrations, multi-platform support, access controls, and guided scripting, makes it easier to design and automate workflows for every process.

similar_products.short_desc: Enables anyone to build workflow applications, web forms, surveys and detailed reporting without writing any code.
similar_products.features: PerfectForms is a feature-rich, web-based development environment - complete with pixel-perfect forms, workflow automation and powerful reporting capabilities - that lets you quickly build and deploy a wide variety of business applications, all without writing a single line of code.  You can build engaging, visually rich forms, design simple or complex workflows, send automatic notifications and escalations, create impressive drill-down reports, and even integrate with external systems.

similar_products.short_desc: OnTask helps you automate & manage processes by creating, routing, reviewing, signing, and approving forms and documents in a workflow.
similar_products.features: Your business, simplified. OnTask is a cloud-based, no-code workflow automation solution that allows you to take control of forms, documents, and processes at your business. OnTask gives visibility into vital processes, reduces time spent on paperwork, and keeps teams connected regardless of remote work. HIPAA, SOC2, and FERPA complaint; OnTask is a secure way to gather customer data, fill forms, automate workflows, generate reusable documents, and collect legally binding signatures. Learn more.

similar_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to manage your workflow: proposals, contracts, invoices, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
similar_products.features:
Workflow management software for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

similar_products.short_desc: An advanced tool designed to help businesses streamline order tracking, manage teams & application packaging processes.
similar_products.features: As a full-fledged application packaging solution with UI-driven architecture, PACE Packager Hub consists of Task Manager and Repository Manager modules. The tool allows in-built customer service and was specially designed for the flexible task and operational processes management. It enables corporate (internal) and external repositories management, fosters smooth communication between engineers and customers, and ensures robust management of the whole app packaging life-cycle.

similar_products.short_desc: The collaborative work management leader, helping organizations streamline and automate processes to accelerate speed to market.
similar_products.features: Adobe Workfront is a collaborative work management solution that addresses the challenges of disconnected teams, siloed tools, and the relentless pace of enterprise work. Workfront connects the enterprise by integrating people, data, and processes with automation. Whether through project templates, streamlined review-and-approval workflows, codeless integrations, or process automations, Workfront provides the tools businesses need to improve workflow and accelerate speed to market.

similar_products.short_desc: Switch on powerful workflows for legal professionals with Thomson Reuters? HighQ.
similar_products.features: HighQ's modern, adaptable, and continuously-learning legal workflow platform delivers an open and scalable foundation, embedded machine intelligence and analytics, and smart integration points with firm-critical applications. Dramatically improve how you plan, organize, track, and complete work more efficiently with personalized client portals and real-time access and insights on legal project work, ready-to-use task lists and templates, and automated workflow-enabled legal process maps.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Process Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Process Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Process Management software enables companies to model, deploy, optimize, and manage business processes. Business Process Management solutions offer a collaborative, continuous conduit through which to institute changes and distribute information throughout an enterprise. Organizations use these applications to coordinate their business environment, schedule and synchronize changes, test the effectiveness of new strategies, and institutionalize best practices. Business Process Management software is related to Systems Integration software and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Professional Services Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Professional Services Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Professional Services Automation (PSA) software enables the tracking, planning, management and billing of services provided by independent contractors and services organizations. Professional Services Automation applications help to streamline individual projects, prevent loss of revenue and slow billing cycles and manage governance. PSA solutions give an overall view of finances, operations and client relationships, enabling a more efficient organization. Professional Services Automation software is related to Project Management software, Time and Expense software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Management software automates task assignment, resource allocation and milestone tracking for all phases of a project. Project Management tools and systems may take one of several approaches: collaborative, when multiple people work on a project; top-down, when one person works on a project at a time; or integrated, when multiple aspects of the organization are involved. There are a variety of project management systems and tools that have been designed to fit your project needs. Project Management software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, Web Collaboration software and Workforce Management software. Find the best project management software for your organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Requirements Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Requirements Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Requirements Management software helps companies align practical needs with IT functionality during the systems development or upgrade process. By managing system requirements, companies can shorten development time and optimize the quality of their systems. Requirements Management software usually covers hardware, software, functional, operational, interface, business and security requirements. Requirements Management software is related to Workflow Management software, Server Management software, Project Management software, Website Monitoring software, and Business Process Management software.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline financial processes and demonstrate accountability with Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT's complete fund accounting system.
related_products.features: Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT delivers unparalleled cloud-based financial management capabilities to keep you compliant with grant reporting standards while helping you streamline your operations. With Financial Edge NXT, capture and monitor grant activity and financials while demonstrating accountability to increase grant renewals. Ensure funds are properly allocated, track and report financial activity from any device with 24/7 accessibility.

related_products.short_desc: SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, etc.
related_products.features: With an over 95% customer retention rate and over 98% customer satisfaction rate, SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, fellowships, data collection, etc.  Create, collect, analyze, and evaluate applications using our mobile-responsive user interface, text message notifications, inline calculations, dynamic application rules, online recommendations, file uploads, and much, much more.

related_products.short_desc: Grants Network modernizes grants management for state, local and tribal governments through SaaS technology.
related_products.features: Grants Network is modernizing grants management for state, local, and tribal governments. The system provides a unified process and portal to search for, track, and administer funding across entire local or state jurisdictions. Whether youre managing an award or a recipient, Grants Network simplifies the entire process and streamlines communication. Grantors can create and track grant solicitations while grantees can track and report on projects all in one centralized system.

related_products.short_desc: Launch, manage, measure, and grow your grants and social impact programs with Submittable's intuitive, flexible cloud-based platform.
related_products.features: Submittable powers you with tools to launch, measure, and grow your social impact programs, locally and globally. From grants and corporate social responsibility programs to awards and scholarships. The start-to-finish platform makes your workflow smarter and more efficient, leading to better decisions and bigger impact. Easily report on success, and learn for the future-Submittable is flexible and powerful enough to grow alongside your programs.

related_products.short_desc: The most flexible and configurable platform for full-cycle program management, supporting grantmakers at mission-based organizations.
related_products.features: Informed, effective, and equitable grantmaking requires more than cookie-cutter software. Zengine by WizeHive is the most flexible solution for grantmakers, providing full lifecycle solutions, tailored workflows, engaging experiences, and invaluable impact analysis and reporting dashboards. Integrates with GuideStar, Salesforce, and 2000+ other systems. Powering some of the world's most heroic missions, including those of leading foundations, CSR programs, universities, and government programs.

related_products.short_desc: Cultivate strong funder relationships and track deadlines, deliverables, and revenue through the grant lifecycle with EveryAction.
related_products.features: Utilize modern, state-of-the-art workflows to identify and research prospective funders, track deadlines and documents throughout the grant lifecycle, and analyze results. EveryAction's powerful, unified nonprofit CRM enables nonprofits of all sizes to cultivate strong funder relationships and easily track communications, deliverables, and revenue throughout the grant process. Built and supported by nonprofit fundraisers, EveryAction is built to increase efficiency and help you raise more money.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Get all the functionality you need, plus donation webpages & build-in email marketing.
related_products.features:
Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Choose the Add-on options you need, including Memberships, Case Management, Grant Management and more to create a solution tailored for your exact needs.

Sumac also offers donation webpages, build-in  email marketing tools, and it integrates with your accounting software.

If you manage unique programs and services, Sumac has a Custom Add-on that we'll configure to meet your exact needs,

related_products.short_desc: Track incoming and outgoing grants, stay on top of reporting requirements, and manage the entire grant cycle.
related_products.features: If you are a grant-making or grant-seeking organization, you need to track and manage a myriad of detailed information throughout the grant process. Exceed Beyond ensures that all aspects of the process are thoroughly accounted for and on schedule. Our Grant Management application empowers you to save time, be more productive, and get exceptional value while streamlining the grant process.

related_products.short_desc: A single cloud-based solution designed for financial planning, expense management, accounting, and transactions.
related_products.features: Workday Financial Management is a single cloud-based financial planning, accounting, and transactions solution. By combining transactions, accounting, analytics, and always-on audit in one system, Workday empowers decision-makers with in-the-moment and on-the-go financial and business insight they can act upon and plan for what's next.

related_products.short_desc: GrantHub for Grantseekers is a grant management solution designed to save you time while increasing your grant funding success
related_products.features: GrantHub for Grantseekers helps you find funders and grants, as well as track and organize all your deadlines, applications, reports, and important grant documents. Instead of using a mix of manual methods and tools (spreadsheets, task manager, calendar, file storage systems. etc.) GrantHub will streamline the creation of your application and proactively send out email reminders when deadlines are coming due. Grant consultants can also use GrantHub to track grants for multiple clients.

similar_products.short_desc: Grant Management Software to Help You Achieve Your Mission. Maximize Outcomes. Meet Performance Standards. Increase Compliance.
similar_products.features: AmpliFund is the leading purpose-built grant management platform designed for organizations ranging from government entities to nonprofits, to educational institutions to manage every phase of the grant management process. Our configurable solution provides a full suite of features needed by grant funders and recipients to maximize grant outcomes, meet performance standards, increase compliance, and achieve their missions.

similar_products.short_desc: Fluxx Grantmaker makes grantmaking and impact reporting easy. Request a demo today.
similar_products.features: Fluxx Grantmaker provides the most complete set of features designed solely for grantmaking - collaboration tools, budgeting and forecasting, grantee engagement, reporting, storytelling, and more - out of the box as part of the base solution. Grantmaker enables data-driven grantmaking via a cloud-based, mobile-optimized platform. Powered by the Fluxx Data CoreTM, Grantmaker fosters collaboration, knowledge transfer, and continuous learning that drives impact for funders and their grantees.

similar_products.short_desc: Foundant GLM is a powerful online grantmaking solution, with an intuitive platform, and guaranteed dedication to clients success.
similar_products.features: Foundant Technologies leads the industry in solutions tailored specifically to support philanthropy. More than 1500 grantmakers use Grant Lifecycle Manager (GLM) - an intuitive platform suitable for users at any technological level. Specializing exclusively in the philanthropic sector, Foundant has dialed in what it means to provide exceptional customer service and support with Client Success Managers dedicated to and trained in client success.

similar_products.short_desc: Submit.com's feature-rich yet easy-to-use secure online platform delivers organisations one seamless grant management solution.
similar_products.features:
Submit.com's Grant Management Software is the most flexible on the market that will adapt to your current grants management process and grow and expand with you.

Feature-rich yet easy-to-use secure online platform delivers organizations one seamless Grant Management solution for the entire grants lifecycle. 

Create and personalize applications, manage all of the back-end administration and review, and take care of reporting, process, and impact, all from one location.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully customizable, all-in-one cloud-based grant management platform to launch, manage, measure, impact report and grow.
similar_products.features: CommunityForce Grant Management Software is the philanthropy industry's leading cloud-based all in one grants platform, enabling users to prospect, collaborate, report and analyze in real time. Integrations with Salesforce and 100+ other systems, powering some of the world's most heroic missions, including those of leading foundations, CSR programs, universities, and government programs, with data-driven grantmaking. Join the 100+ non profits using the best in class grants management software!

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful fundraising and supporter management tools which help you work more efficiently and bring in more money for your mission.
similar_products.features: With Blackbaud Grantmaking, benefit from an open grantmaking software platform that integrates with your other business solutions while still providing an intuitive user experience. Sign in from any device, anywhere, on any browser, making it easy for staff to manage the grants workflow or share important grant management information anytime. Effortlessly setup online application forms for review from anywhere for faster approval. See how Blackbaud can add value to your organization.

similar_products.short_desc: The Optimy grant management solution coordinates all of your applications in one place in a concise and easy-to-view dashboard.
similar_products.features: Mission-driven companies deserve a customer-focused solution to manage grants across all stages of the life cycle. Optimy's grant management software enables you to receive and select grants applications to better serve the ones you are trying to help and at the same time to manage and report on your impact to those who offer their support. With Optimy, you get a personalised service, we believe in human interaction and put it in the centre of our work.

similar_products.short_desc: Good Grants is a grantmaking platform that helps grantmakers around the world affordably accept, manage and fund grant applications.
similar_products.features:
Good Grants is an internationalised grantmaking platform that helps small to medium-sized grantmakers around the world affordably accept, manage and fund good grant applications, their way.

Designed for grantmakers who have outgrown manual processes and spreadsheet program management, Good Grants offers an attractive alternative to overpriced grantmaking software. 

Good Grants empowers grantmakers to manage the entire grant lifecycle, streamline processes and optimise funding, online.

similar_products.short_desc: GrantHub for Grantseekers is a grant management solution designed to save you time while increasing your grant funding success
similar_products.features: GrantHub for Grantseekers helps you find funders and grants, as well as track and organize all your deadlines, applications, reports, and important grant documents. Instead of using a mix of manual methods and tools (spreadsheets, task manager, calendar, file storage systems. etc.) GrantHub will streamline the creation of your application and proactively send out email reminders when deadlines are coming due. Grant consultants can also use GrantHub to track grants for multiple clients.

similar_products.short_desc: SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, etc.
similar_products.features: With an over 95% customer retention rate and over 98% customer satisfaction rate, SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, fellowships, data collection, etc.  Create, collect, analyze, and evaluate applications using our mobile-responsive user interface, text message notifications, inline calculations, dynamic application rules, online recommendations, file uploads, and much, much more.

similar_products.short_desc: InfoStrat's Grants Manager Plus is a Microsoft Dynamics 365-powered grant management solution that simplifies the entire grant process.
similar_products.features: InfoStrat's Grants Manager Plus provides grantors with an all-in-one, integrated solution that simplifies the grants process from initial solicitation through review, scoring, award, payment processing and post award reporting.

related_categories.description: Fund Accounting software automates accounting and portfolio management functions for nonprofit organizations, alternative asset managers, private bankers, foundations and government agencies. Fund administrators utilize these applications to assist in strategic decision making and to increase accountability across an organization's financial operations. Fund Accounting software also assists with regulatory compliance management and financial reporting on portfolio performance. Fund Accounting software is related to Accounting software and Government software.

related_categories.description: Fundraising software manages donor and pledge information associated with fundraising campaigns. Development professionals use Fundraising applications to enhance their ability to locate, manage and grow donor sources. Fundraising software facilitates cost effective targeting of likely donors, tracks pledges, and manages contributions and donor relationship management. These applications also provide a variety of tools allowing fundraisers to track the effectiveness of their development campaigns. Fundraising software is related to Church Management software, Event Management software and Political Campaign software.
